Finalize and send quote to customer

Enter customer answer to quote and specify main explanations ( as Reason for Closing)

Understand customer needs (in the opportunity process)

Complete missing mandatory information with quote and quote line item, e.g. surcharge,...

Understand supply situation (product availability) and plant's product mix priority

Build a first price proposal and fill in corresponding fields

If relevant, request a freight price to the logistic team

Notify relevant stakeholders to engage the validation of the quote i.e. submit for approval (optional)
